description: Very solid and well built 3 bedroom 3 storey townhouse with 4 baths. Over 1800 sq ft not included Garage. Excellent location and close to school and transport. Comes with Quartz counter tops , Large kitchen with lots of cabinets,  Appliances and Blinds. Very easy to view with short notice. Very well priced for quick sale. More info please touch base or call.
